titleStmt.title: Where, in all well-gouerned kingdomes ... care hath euer beene duly had and taken ... that breade, meats and drinkes ... to be solde ... should bee good ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).
Middleton, Thomas, Sir, 1550-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iaggard, printer to the honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first five lines of text.
Lord Mayor's initials, T.[homas] M.[iddleton], at head of text.
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Establishes regulations for the sale of foodstuffs.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
